review: I received my unit in record time. However, I was not informed nor did I find in the description of the product did I see that I had to have internet access. When I called roku tech support they tried to charge me to activate the unit. I had already did that. I needed to know how to get a hotspot password and set up for access. They hung up on me twice. I am still very angry for this treatment. I called Amazon cust. service. and the rep I spoke with was very understanding, but my cell phone had a defect and I was not able to complete my complaint. Trying to address that issue today. Will call from a relative's phone to follow up. Thanks. R. Baker 404 -453-8417
